snippet: Medical-device companies persuaded lawmakers, even liberal senators, to support repeal of a vitally needed tax.
abstract: Editorial decries fact that forceul and well-financed lobbying campaign on part of medical-device companies has persuaded lawmakers to support repeal of vitally needed tax within health care reform law.
lead_paragraph: Medical-device companies persuaded lawmakers, even liberal senators, to support repeal of a vitally needed tax.

headline.seo: One Industry’s Hold on the Senate
